wikipedia_page.main: Peter Kuhfeld (born 4 March 1952) is an English figurative painter.  He was born in Cheltenham and is married to the English figurative painter Cathryn Kuhfeld, née Showan.  They have two daughters who have often appeared in their paintings.

response: In 1985, he had his portrait painted by Peter Kuhfeld, currently on loan to the National Trust, Antony.

* "At the head of my list I would place Peter Greenham and his wife, Jane Dowling, for I have long been not only a great admirer of their work but also of that of the artists who have studied under them — Cheryll Fountain, Peter Kuhfeld, Edmund Fairfax-Lucy, Martin Shortis and Martin Yeoman." Sir Brinsley Ford (1991).
